010package imagingbook.common.sift;
011
012/**
013 * <p>
014 * Represents a match between two SIFT features. See Secs. 25.5 of [1] for more
015 * details. Instances are immutable.
016 * </p>
017 * <p>
018 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
019 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
020 * </p>
021 * 
022 * @author WB
023 * @version 2022/11/20
024 */
025public class SiftMatch implements Comparable<SiftMatch> {
026        
027        private final SiftDescriptor descriptor1, descriptor2;
028        private final double distance;
029        
030        public SiftMatch(SiftDescriptor descriptor1, SiftDescriptor descriptor2, double distance) {
031                this.descriptor1 = descriptor1;
032                this.descriptor2 = descriptor2;
033                this.distance = distance;
034        }
035        
036        public SiftDescriptor getDescriptor1() {
037                return descriptor1;
038        }
039        
040        public SiftDescriptor getDescriptor2() {
041                return descriptor2;
042        }
043        
044        public double getDistance() {
045                return distance;
046        }
047
048        @Override
049        public int compareTo(SiftMatch other) {
050                return Double.compare(this.distance, other.distance);
051        }
052        
053        @Override
054        public String toString() {
055                return String.format("%s %.2f", this.getClass().getSimpleName(), distance);
056        }
057
058}
